properties.name: EngagementMetrics
properties.description: Whether emails sent with this configuration set have engagement tracking enabled.

type.description: Whether emails sent with this configuration set have engagement tracking enabled.

DeliveryOptions.description: An object that defines the dedicated IP pool that is used to send emails that you send using the configuration set.

properties.name: SendingPoolName
properties.description: The name of the dedicated IP pool to associate with the configuration set.

type.description: The name of the dedicated IP pool to associate with the configuration set.

properties.name: TlsPolicy
properties.description: Specifies whether messages that use the configuration set are required to use Transport Layer Security (TLS). If the value is Require , messages are only delivered if a TLS connection can be established. If the value is Optional , messages can be delivered in plain text if a TLS connection can't be established.

type.description: Specifies whether messages that use the configuration set are required to use Transport Layer Security (TLS). If the value is Require , messages are only delivered if a TLS connection can be established. If the value is Optional , messages can be delivered in plain text if a TLS connection can't be established.

properties.name: OptimizedSharedDelivery
properties.description: Whether emails sent with this configuration set have optimized delivery algorithm enabled.

type.description: Whether emails sent with this configuration set have optimized delivery algorithm enabled.

ReputationOptions.description: An object that defines whether or not Amazon SES collects reputation metrics for the emails that you send that use the configuration set.

properties.name: ReputationMetricsEnabled
properties.description: If true , tracking of reputation metrics is enabled for the configuration set. If false , tracking of reputation metrics is disabled for the configuration set.

type.description: If true , tracking of reputation metrics is enabled for the configuration set. If false , tracking of reputation metrics is disabled for the configuration set.

SendingOptions.description: An object that defines whether or not Amazon SES can send email that you send using the configuration set.

SuppressionOptions.description: An object that contains information about the suppression list preferences for your account.

properties.name: SuppressedReasons
properties.description: A list that contains the reasons that email addresses are automatically added to the suppression list for your account.

type.description: A list that contains the reasons that email addresses are automatically added to the suppression list for your account.

itemType.description: The reason that the address was added to the suppression list for your account

TrackingOptions.description: An object that defines the open and click tracking options for emails that you send using the configuration set.

properties.name: CustomRedirectDomain
properties.description: The domain to use for tracking open and click events.

type.description: The domain to use for tracking open and click events.

VdmOptions.description: An object that contains Virtual Deliverability Manager (VDM) settings for this configuration set.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the configuration set.

type.description: The name of the configuration set.
